person.persName: James H. Bridgewater (Lincoln County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier)

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Susan Dawes Bridgewater in Lincoln County, Kentucky, in 1854. Father of Volney A. Bridgewater and Sarah H. Bridgewater. Laborer in Lincoln County in 1860. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as 2nd lieutenant from October 8, 1861, to January 7, 1862. Chief of police in Stanford in 1863. Served in the Hall's Gap Battalion (U.S.A.) as captain and major from June 1, 1864, to July 27, 1865.
